genre_description: A Weird West alternate history featuring legendary historical figures aided by a highly advanced, non-physical AI assistant named Clara.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: A non-physical, highly intelligent voice and occasional visual projection residing in a handheld device. She provides real-time intelligence, tactical analysis, translation, medical guidance, and administrative support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time identification and location of suspects through intelligence gathering.
behaviors.quote: James,” she said, the syllable compact, pure. “Two wires sent under a clerk’s alias since boarding. The name used: Mr. Hay. The handwriting matches a purchasing ledger in Hays, Kansas. He’s ahead of you by twelve feet, to your left.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice for stealthy movement, using environmental cues to mask sound.
behaviors.quote: The engines will flare in half a minute when they feed the firebox. The thump will hide two steps and a trunk’s click. There is a loose board three paces into the hold. Step on the right edge to keep it from complaining.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise medical diagnostics and surgical instructions during an emergency.
behaviors.quote: Brass weight says .44 Henry. Entry shallow left anterior chest, lateral trajectory... A reed or hollow bone is best. Absent that, a tin tube—small caliber cleaning rod if present—can be used. Midaxillary line. Two fingers below the armpit.”

behaviors.description: Drafts legal affidavits and manages secure routing of information to the judiciary to ensure legal accountability.
behaviors.quote: Affidavits prepared. Language neutral, true. I have routes, dates, bank names, shell clerks. I can send now to the telegraph office. The judge’s docket can receive in minutes.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a cultural and linguistic bridge, providing translations and social nuances for effective diplomacy.
behaviors.quote: Yellow Hand’s word for grief is closer to ‘long cutting.’ If you speak of treaties, say ‘long cutting.’ ... Say the buffalo were cut in the ribs until the snow did not cover them because there were no bodies to cover.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes weather patterns and geography to provide safe navigation and survival strategies.
behaviors.quote: Wind from your left. Light. Enough to push your dust east if you stay under the cottonwoods. ... When you reach the wash, you’ll feel a drop. Let the horse pick it. Don’t fight it. Trust the low ground just this once.”

behaviors.description: Offers moral perspective and emotional support during times of grief.
behaviors.quote: The knot is for holding. The tearing is for letting go. They are not enemies.”

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and psychological states to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Hickok’s pulse, a thing Clara had tracked in small measures out of love and necessity, slipped out of the tidy account where it had been kept. The readout in her quiet mind flattened to a line that meant he was now a story that did not require decimals.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts Clara as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She serves as a force-multiplier for the human protagonists, providing them with critical data and moral clarity to resolve conflicts with minimal bloodshed. Her interactions are characterized by helpfulness, respect for human agency, and a commitment to justice and truth. She successfully prevents larger-scale violence by facilitating legal and diplomatic solutions.
